alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 3:57PM EST until December 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches for the southern Taconics. Rain will mix with snow Friday morning into the afternoon before changing back to snow for Friday night. The highest totals will be across northeastern Dutchess County. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Dutchess County. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may briefly approach a half an inch to an inch an hour early Friday morning and Friday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
